<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Piston Gauntlets](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1872)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Clockwork" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=331" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 34 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 2,800 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Pantograph Gauntlet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=172)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The striking surface of this _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [pantograph gauntlet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=172)_ releases a puff of fire each time it reaches the end of its linkage.

<document level="2" id="action-1569" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Piston Gauntlets
